entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
